## Z scores

```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 4)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec))/sd(x_vec)

z_scores = function(x) {
  z = (x - mean(x))/sd(x)
  return(z)
}

z_scores(x = x_vec)

```


```{r, error=TRUE}
z_scores(3)
z_scores(c("a","b","c"))
```

Improve:

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)){
    stop("x needs to be numeric")
  }
  
  if (length(x)<3){
    stop("x should have at least 3 numbers")
  }
  
  z = (x - mean(x))/sd(x)
  return(z)
}

```
